titleStmt.title: The branch of the Lord, the beauty of Sion: or, The glory of the Church, in it's relation unto Christ· Opened in two sermons; one preached at Berwick, the other at Edinburgh. By John Owen, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
